questions.sdg_target: 1.3 Strengthen social protection via circular models
questions.kpi: Engagement in community-based textile recycling/upcycling initiatives
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated textile recycling or upcycling practices that create local employment or income opportunities in vulnerable communities?

questions.sdg_target: 1.5 Build resilience for vulnerable workers
questions.kpi: Climate resilience measures in textile factories
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented climate resilience measures to protect vulnerable workers (e.g., temporary staff, garment workers in heat-prone facilities, etc?

questions.sdg_target: 1.2 Reduce poverty through fair wages & employment
questions.kpi: Percentage of textile workers earning a standard minimum wage
questions.question: To what extent has the company ensured that all employees receive wages that meet or exceed local living wage standards, contributing to poverty reduction?

questions.sdg_target: 1.4 Ensure access to financial services
questions.kpi: Access to microfinance or financial literacy programs
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with access to financial literacy programs, savings schemes, or partnerships that improve financial security for low-income workers?

questions.sdg_target: 2.5 Maintain genetic diversity of seeds, cultivated plants
questions.kpi: % of agricultural waste used
questions.question: Does the company use fibers from diverse agricultural by-products (e.g., banana stems, hemp, etc) within its product lines, reducing dependence on single raw materials and supporting agricultural biodiversity?

questions.sdg_target: 2.4 Ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices
questions.kpi: Support of ecosystem restoration
questions.question: Has the company adopted sourcing practices (e.g., certified cotton, regenerative agriculture, biodiversity standards) that contribute to restoring or maintaining healthy agricultural ecosystems in its supply chain regions?

questions.sdg_target: 2.3 Double the productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers
questions.kpi: % increase in sourcing from small-scale farmers or cooperatives producing natural fibers
questions.question: To what extent does the company source agricultural fibers (e.g., cotton, hemp, flax) from small-scale farmers or cooperatives, thereby improving livelihoods and market access for vulnerable producers?

questions.sdg_target: 2.1 Nutritious and sufficient food for all
questions.kpi: % of employees provided access to affordable and nutritious meals at the workplace
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with access to affordable and nutritious food options (e.g., canteens, meal subsidies, etc) that contribute to improved food security?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 Reduce exposure through circularity
questions.kpi: % of recycled materials certified safe for health
questions.question: To what extent does the company verify that recycled or upcycled textile materials used in production are tested and certified to be free from harmful substances for workers and consumers?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 Reduce exposure to hazardous chemicals
questions.kpi: % reduction in use of hazardous dyes and treatments
questions.question: Has the company phased out or significantly reduced hazardous chemicals in dyeing, finishing, and other processes by adopting safer, non-toxic alternatives?

questions.sdg_target: 3.c Support employee health capacity
questions.kpi: % annual budget allocated to employees receiving annual health check-ups
questions.question: To what extent does the company invest in occupational health services that reduce absenteeism and strengthen long-term workforce productivity?

questions.sdg_target: 3.4 Promote employee well-being
questions.kpi: Access to mental health resources and flexible hours
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with accessible mental health support and implement flexible working policies that promote work-life balance?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.6 Ensure inclusive access to education
questions.kpi: % of employees trained in textile recycling & upcycling techniques
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide employee training on textile recycling, upcycling, and circular design practices?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.7 Sustainability education
questions.kpi: Inclusion of sustainability in worker orientation programs
questions.question: Has the company integrated continuous environmental and sustainability training into employee onboarding/learning programs?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.4 Promote skills for work
questions.kpi: % of annual budget for employees to enrolled in job-relevant upskilling or certification
questions.question: To what extent does the company support employees in acquiring new skills or certifications that enhance both individual career prospects and company competitiveness?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.5 Empower marginalized employees
questions.kpi: Number of marginalized or underrepresented employees receiving training
questions.question: Does the company provide targeted skill development opportunities for underrepresented or marginalized groups within its workforce?

questions.sdg_target: 5.5 Promote women's leadership & entrepreneurship
questions.kpi: Percentage of women employed in textile recycling/upcycling processes
questions.question: To what extent are women equally represented in decision-making and participation in the company’s circular initiatives?

questions.sdg_target: 5.5 Ensure equal workplace safety
questions.kpi: Implementation of gender-inclusive workplace safety measures
questions.question: Has the company assessed and addressed gender-specific risks in workplace health & safety policies (e.g., ergonomic design of equipment, protective gear fit)?

questions.sdg_target: 5.4 Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work
questions.kpi: Percentage of women in the workforce benefiting from paid family leave and childcare support
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure access to paid family leave, childcare facilities, or flexible work arrangements for women employees?

questions.sdg_target: 5.2 Eliminate violence and harassment against women
questions.kpi: Policies and mechanisms to prevent workplace harassment
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented anti-harassment and discrimination policies supported by confidential reporting mechanisms?

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 Improve water efficiency
questions.kpi: % of reused water in production or industrial processes
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented measures (e.g., water-saving technologies, closed-loop dyeing) to increase water-use efficiency in production?

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 Increase water-use efficiency
questions.kpi: Percentage of wastewater treated before discharge
questions.question: Has the company installed and maintained effective wastewater treatment systems (e.g., filtration, biological treatment) to reduce pollution and ensure compliance with discharge standards?

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 Improve water efficiency
questions.kpi: % reduction in water treatment costs through process efficiency
questions.question: To what extent has the company improved water and wastewater management efficiency to reduce operational costs and strengthen long-term financial sustainability?

questions.sdg_target: 6.2 Ensure adequate sanitation & hygiene for community
questions.kpi: Percentage of workers with access to safe sanitation & hygiene facilities
questions.question: Has the company ensured that all workers have access to clean drinking water, safe sanitation, and hygiene facilities?

questions.sdg_target: 7.3 Improve energy efficiency
questions.kpi: Reductions in energy requirements of sold products and services
questions.question: To what extent does the company recover and reuse energy within its textile production cycle to close resource loops?

questions.sdg_target: 7.2 Increase the share of renewable energy
questions.kpi: % of energy from renewable sources
questions.question: To what extent has the company replaced fossil-based energy with renewable sources in its operations?

questions.sdg_target: 7.3 Improve energy efficiency
questions.kpi: Investment in energy-efficient production technologies
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested in upgrading machinery, equipment, or processes to improve energy efficiency and reduce production costs?

questions.sdg_target: 7.3 Improve energy efficiency
questions.kpi: Employee training and awareness programs on energy efficiency
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with training and engagement programs on energy-saving practices and the efficient use of clean energy technologies in daily operations?

questions.sdg_target: 8.3 Promote circular business models in textiles
questions.kpi: Percentage of textile production linked to circular business models
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated circular business models (e.g., clothing rental, resale, repair, take-back) into its operations to create new value and reduce textile waste?

questions.sdg_target: 8.4 Improve environmental impact of production
questions.kpi: Reduction of water & chemical usage per batch production
questions.question: Has the company adopted production technologies or processes that improve resource efficiency and reduce environmental impacts while supporting sustainable growth?

questions.sdg_target: 8.2 Improve productivity through sustainable innovation
questions.kpi: Percentage of revenue from sustainable textile products
questions.question: To what extent has the company expanded its portfolio or revenue streams through sustainable textile products?

questions.sdg_target: 8.5 Promote equal pay & gender equality in textile workforce
questions.kpi: Gender pay gap reduction & women in leadership
questions.question: Has the company implemented programs to create employment opportunities, vocational training, or apprenticeships for young workers entering the textile industry?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.2 Sustainable Industrialization
questions.kpi: Implementation of circular design tools for industrial efficiency
questions.question: To what extent has the company applied circular design principles in product development and manufacturing processes?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.4 Upgrade infrastructure for sustainability
questions.kpi: % of machinery upgraded to low-impact alternatives
questions.question: Has the company upgraded its production infrastructure to significantly reduce energy use, emissions, and water consumption?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.5 R&D Investment & Innovation
questions.kpi: % of annual revenue invested in R&D for sustainable textile solutions
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested in research, development, and innovation for sustainable and low-impact textile manufacturing?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.4 Upgrade infrastructure for skills
questions.kpi: % of staff involved in technical upskilling or equipment handling
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with technical training and upskilling programs that enable effective use of new or upgraded production infrastructure?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion
questions.kpi: % of textile products recycled and reused in underserved communities
questions.question: To what extent are underrepresented or marginalized groups included in the company’s circular initiatives (e.g., recycling, upcycling, or take-back programs) as employees, suppliers, or partners?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote the social, economic, and environmental inclusion of all
questions.kpi: % of sustainability initiatives in production/operation driven by employee-led teams
questions.question: Has the company ensured that all employees, regardless of role or background, are equally involved in workplace sustainability initiatives?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion of all
questions.kpi: % of underrepresented employees receiving bonuses or performance-linked incentives
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure fair and transparent distribution of wages, benefits, and incentives across all employees, including those from underrepresented groups?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion
questions.kpi: No. of company activities/events promoting cultural understanding
questions.question: Has the company implemented structured initiatives (e.g., diversity programs, cultural awareness activities) to promote inclusion, diversity, and belonging in the workplace?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 Urban Waste Reuse Systems
questions.kpi: % of post-consumer textile waste collected through local reuse/recycle initiatives
questions.question: To what extent has the company established systems to reuse or recycle textile waste in partnership with local urban stakeholders (e.g., municipalities, SMEs, NGOs)?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 Air Quality Measures
questions.kpi: % ogfAdoption of air filtration or emission reduction systems at urban production units
questions.question: Has the company installed and maintained technologies or practices to reduce local air emissions from textile production that affect urban communities?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.A – Support for positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas
questions.kpi: Number or percentage of collaborations with local micro-enterprises (e.g., tailoring, textile repair, upcycling) in urban areas
questions.question: To what extent does the company support local urban micro-enterprises (e.g., tailoring, repair, upcycling workshops) to strengthen circular textile value chains and local employment?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.1 Employee Housing and Commute Support
questions.kpi: % of urban employees provided with company-supported housing assistance or subsidized commuting options
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide workplace facilities or benefits that improve employees’ quality of life in urban settings (e.g., affordable meals, flexible hours, safe transport)?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.1. Implement a framework of programs on sustainable production and consumption
questions.kpi: Post-consumer recycled content
questions.question: Has the company assessed the share of recycled materials (pre- and post-consumer) in its products and set measurable targets to increase it?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.2 Achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
questions.kpi: Water footprint
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented resource efficiency measures (e.g., reduced water, energy, and raw material use) across its production processes?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.6 Encourage companies to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle
questions.kpi: Financial reporting
questions.question: Has the company integrated sustainability performance indicators (e.g., resource efficiency savings, etc) into financial planning and reporting?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.8 Ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature
questions.kpi: Communication programs and actions promoting social corporate responsibility
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide education and awareness for employees and customers on sustainable textile production and responsible consumption practices?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
questions.kpi: Integration of circular product design strategies to mitigate climate change impacts across the product lifecycle
questions.question: To what extent has the company assessed and reduced the greenhouse gas emissions associated with product design choices (e.g., material selection, recyclability, durability, reuse, compostability)?

questions.sdg_target: 13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters
questions.kpi: Progress in reducing operational GHG emissions
questions.question: Has the company measured its greenhouse gas emissions and implemented strategies to reduce them over time?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
questions.kpi: Integration of Climate-Related Risks and Opportunities into Financial Strategy
questions.question: To what extent has the company assessed climate-related risks and opportunities and integrated them into business planning?

questions.sdg_target: 13.3 Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning
questions.kpi: % of employees and stakeholders trained on climate action
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with training and awareness programs on climate change and its relevance to textile production, and encourage their participation in mitigation initiatives?

questions.sdg_target: 14.C Enhance the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources byimplementing international law as reflected in UNCLOS, which provides the legalframework for the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources, asrecalled in paragraph 158 of The Future We Want
questions.kpi: Implementation of circular sourcing initiatives
questions.question: To what extent has the company adopted circular material strategies (e.g., microfiber capture, recycled fibers, reduced synthetic blends) that directly reduce textile-derived marine pollution?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1. By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular fromland-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
questions.kpi: Reduction in Pollutants in Wastewater Discharge
questions.question: Has the company implemented measures to reduce pollutants (e.g., dyes, microfibers, heavy metals, chemical oxygen demand) in wastewater discharged from textile production?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1. By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular fromland-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
questions.kpi: Percentage of cost savings
questions.question: To what extent has the company achieved cost savings or improved efficiency by reducing wastewater pollutants?

questions.sdg_target: 14.3. Minimize and address the impacts of ocean acidification, including through enhanced scientific cooperation at all levels
questions.kpi: Number of scientific cooperation initiatives
questions.question: Has the company engaged employees, suppliers, or local partners in initiatives or training programs aimed at reducing impacts on water bodies of textile production?

questions.sdg_target: 15.2 Promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally
questions.kpi: Use of circular/recycled raw materials
questions.question: To what extent has the company adopted circular material strategies that reduce dependence on virgin land-based resources and lower land-use pressure?

questions.sdg_target: 15.1 Ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands
questions.kpi: Contribution to biodiversity and restoration through raw material strategy
questions.question: Has the company integrated biodiversity protection and sustainable land-use criteria into its raw material sourcing?

questions.sdg_target: 15.5 Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species
questions.kpi: Assessment of biodiversity-related financial risks
questions.question: To what extent has the company identified and integrated biodiversity-related risks into financial planning, sourcing decisions, and long-term investment strategies?

questions.sdg_target: 15.1 Ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands
questions.kpi: Community engagement in land stewardship
questions.question: Does the company collaborate with local communities in sourcing regions to support biodiversity protection and sustainable land management?

questions.sdg_target: 16.5 Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
questions.kpi: Supply chain transparency
questions.question: To what extent does the company assess supply chain partners for transparency and traceability in materials sourcing?

questions.sdg_target: 16.6 Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
questions.kpi: Public Sustainability Reporting
questions.question: Has the company established an environmental management system that includes performance tracking, regular reporting?

questions.sdg_target: 16.5 Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
questions.kpi: Anti-corruption policies and internal audits
questions.question: Has the company implemented anti-corruption measures in procurement and financial practices?

questions.sdg_target: 16.B Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development.
questions.kpi: Non-discrimination and equal opportunities
questions.question: To what extent has the company adopted and enforced formal non-discrimination and equal opportunity policies across all organisational levels?

questions.sdg_target: 17.1. Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to developing countries, to improve domestic capacity for tax and other revenue collection
questions.kpi: Revenue growth (%) from circular-designed textile products
questions.question: To what extent has the company engaged in partnerships or collaborations (e.g., suppliers, research institutions, networks) to develop or adopt circular design and sourcing practices that enhance competitiveness and resilience?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.7. Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies to developing countries on favourable terms, including on concessional andpreferential terms, as mutually agreed
questions.kpi: Number of technology transfer initiatives to developing countries per year.
questions.question: Does the company contribute to the development, transfer, or sharing of environmentally sound textile technologies or practices with partners or developing regions?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.3. Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
questions.kpi: Financial resources mobilized annually for sustainable organic textile initiatives in developing countries.
questions.question: Has the company mobilized financial resources from multiple sources (e.g., public funding, private investment, partnerships, or grants) to expand sustainable textile initiatives?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.6 Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperationon and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharingon mutually agreed terms
questions.kpi: Partnerships supporting sustainable textile technology exchange
questions.question: Has the company actively participated in partnerships or networks (regional, international, or sectoral) to share best practices, foster innovation, and build collective capacity for sustainable textile production?

questions.sdg_target: 1.5 Strengthen the resilience of vulnerable groups and reduce their exposure to climate-related events and other economic, social, and environmental shocks
questions.kpi: % of bio-based fertilizers made from locally available organic waste
questions.question: To what extennt company's bio-based fertilizers are produced using organic waste sourced from local agricultural or food industries to support local economies?

questions.sdg_target: 1.5 Strengthen the resilience of vulnerable groups and reduce their exposure to climate-related events and other economic, social, and environmental shocks
questions.kpi: Climate resilience measures in factories
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented climate resilience measures specifically aimed at protecting vulnerable workers (e.g., temporary workers, farm labourers, or those exposed to extreme weather)?

questions.sdg_target: 1.2 Reduce by at least half the share of people of all ages living in poverty in all its forms
questions.kpi: Percentage workers earning a living wage
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure that all workers receive fair and decent wages in line with living wage standards?

questions.sdg_target: 1.4 Ensure equal rights to economic resources and access to services, property, natural resources, technology, and finance for all, especially the poor and vulnerable
questions.kpi: Access to microfinance or financial literacy programs
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide or facilitate access to financial literacy training or microfinance opportunities for its workers?

questions.sdg_target: 2.4 Ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices
questions.kpi: fertilizer production from recycled into agricultural use
questions.question: To what extent are the company’s fertiliser products produced using recovered nutrients or organic waste as primary inputs?

questions.sdg_target: 2.5 Maintain genetic diversity of seeds, cultivated plants and animals
questions.kpi: % of raw materials sourced from practices promoting agrobiodiversity
questions.question: To what extent does the company source organic waste or raw inputs from farms that actively promote crop diversity and conserve genetic resources?

questions.sdg_target: 2.3 Double the productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers
questions.kpi: % of smallholder farmers benefiting from the company's fertilizer products (via direct sales or programs)
questions.question: To what extent has the company expanded its programs, distribution, or sales channels to increase market access for smallholder farmers to bio-based fertiliser products?

questions.sdg_target: 2.1 End hunger and ensure access by all people to safe, nutritiuous and sufficient food
questions.kpi: % of employees provided access to affordable and nutritious meals at the workplace
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide affordable and nutritious food options for employees (e.g., canteen meals, subsidised food programs) at the workplace?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 Promote safe reuse of nutrients
questions.kpi: % of reused materials proven to be non-toxic for soil and crops
questions.question: To what extent does the company test and validate secondary or recovered bio-materials to ensure their safe reuse in production without risks to human health or the environment?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 Prevent exposure to harmful substances
questions.kpi: % reduction in toxic emissions from fertilizer production
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented cleaner production technologies to minimise toxic emissions and hazardous by-products in fertiliser manufacturing?

questions.sdg_target: 3.C Support employee health capacity
questions.kpi: % annual budget allocated to employees receiving annual health check-ups
questions.question: To what extent does the company allocate resources to provide regular health check-ups and occupational health services for employees as part of its long-term productivity strategy?

questions.sdg_target: 3.4 Promote employee well-being
questions.kpi: Access to mental health resources and flexible hours
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide employees with access to mental health support services and flexible working arrangements?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.6 Ensure that all youth and a substantial proportion of adults, both men and women, achieve literacy and numeracy
questions.kpi: % of employees trained in fertilizer recycling or nutrient recovery
questions.question: Does the company provide employees with training on nutrient recovery practices and the safe use of recycled fertilisers?

questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated environmental sustainability education into employee onboarding and regular training programmes?

questions.kpi: % of annual budget for employees to enrolled in job-relevant upskilling or certification
questions.question: Has the company invested in supporting employees to upskill or obtain relevant professional certifications?

questions.sdg_target: 4.5 Eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education
questions.kpi: Number of marginalized or underrepresented employees receiving training

questions.kpi: Inclusion of women in research and innovation
questions.question: To what extent are women actively involved in research, innovation, or product development aimed at improving circularity (e.g., bio-based materials, resource-efficient processes)?

questions.kpi: Implementation of gender-inclusive measures in environmental practices

questions.kpi: % of workers benefiting from paid family leave and childcare support

questions.kpi: Policies and mechanisms to prevent workplace harassment

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 Increase water-use efficiency
questions.kpi: % reduction in freshwater consumption per ton of bio-fertilizer produced
questions.question: To what extent has the company adopted water-efficient technologies or practices to reduce freshwater consumption?

questions.kpi: Reducing operational costs through water efficiency

questions.sdg_target: 6.2 Ensure access to adequate sanitation & hygiene for all
questions.kpi: % investment in local clean water and sanitation initiatives
questions.question: To what extent has the company ensured adequate sanitation and hygiene conditions for its own workers, and contributed to improving such access for nearby communities?

questions.sdg_target: 7.2 Increase the share of renewable energy
questions.kpi: Amount of renewable energy recovered and used for energy in fertilizer production

questions.sdg_target: 9.4 Upgrade infrastructure for skills

questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion
questions.kpi: % of recycled fertilizers provided to underserved or smallholder farmers
questions.question: To what extent has the company expanded access to recycled or bio-based fertilizers for smallholder or marginalized farmers, supporting more inclusive circular value chains?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote the social, economic, and environmental inclusion of all
questions.kpi: Inclusion of workers in environmental initiatives
questions.question: To what extent are employees from diverse backgrounds engaged in environmental improvement initiatives?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion of all
questions.kpi: % of underrepresented employees receiving bonuses or performance-linked incentives
questions.question: To what extent are wages, benefits, and performance incentives distributed equitably across employees, including those from underrepresented or marginalized groups?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 Promote inclusion
questions.kpi: No. of company activities/events promoting cultural understanding
questions.question: Has the company implemented initiatives (e.g., training, events, mentorship) to foster inclusion, cultural diversity, and equal participation in the workplace?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 – Reduce waste generation through better production and consumption practices.
questions.kpi: % of packaging materials used in product distribution that are recyclable or biodegradable
questions.question: Has the company integrated recyclable, biodegradable, or reusable packaging materials into its fertilizer distribution system as part of circular economy practices?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 – Reduce waste generation and environmental impact through closed-loop systems.
questions.kpi: Percentage of Fertilizer Production Process Using Closed-Loop Systems
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented closed-loop systems (e.g., nutrient recovery, water reuse, or by-product valorization) in its production process to reduce waste and environmental impacts?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 Cleaner production processes
questions.kpi: % increase in production efficiency per unit of input material (e.g., water, energy, raw materials)
questions.question: To what extent has the company optimized resource use (water, energy, raw materials) to reduce operational costs and improve long-term economic sustainability?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.1 Employee Housing and Commute Support
questions.kpi: % of urban employees provided with benefits or subsidized commuting options
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide workplace facilities or benefits that improve employees’ quality of life in urban settings (e.g., affordable meals, flexible hours, safe transport)?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.5 Substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse
questions.kpi: Nutrients from recovered or waste-based sources in production
questions.question: Has the company established monitoring systems to track waste reduction and nutrient recovery performance across its production processes?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.4 Ensure environmentally sound management of chemicals and waste across their lifecycle
questions.kpi: Freshwater/Seawater eutrophication impact
questions.question: To what extent has the company assessed the eutrophication potential of its products (freshwater/marine) and implemented measures to reduce or mitigate these impacts?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.4 Ensure environmentally sound management of chemicals and waste across their lifecycle
questions.kpi: Percentage of product that is slow-releasing fertilizer
questions.question: To what extent has the company expanded its portfolio of bio-based slow-release fertilizers and developed a strategy to increase their market share?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.4 Ensure environmentally sound management of chemicals and waste across their lifecycle
questions.kpi: Implementation status of chemical management procedures to protect employees
questions.question: Has the company provided employees with regular training on safe handling, storage, and application of fertilizers and chemicals to ensure responsible production practices?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
questions.kpi: Circular design to reduce lifecycle GHG emissions
questions.question: Has the company implemented circular practices (nutrient recovery, organic waste valorisation, etc.) that contribute to reducing lifecycle GHG emissions of its products?

questions.sdg_target: 13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters
questions.kpi: Progress in reducing operational GHG emissions
questions.question: Has the company adopted concrete measures (e.g., energy efficiency upgrades, low-carbon transport, renewable energy use) to reduce direct and indirect GHG emissions in fertilizer production and distribution?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
questions.kpi: Integration of Climate-Related Risks and Opportunities into Financial Strategy
questions.question: To what extent has your organisation integrated climate-related risks or opportunities into its financial planning, investment strategies or product development?

questions.sdg_target: 13.3 Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning
questions.kpi: % of employees and stakeholders trained on climate action
questions.question: Does the company provide training and awareness programs on climate change adaptation and mitigation for employees?

questions.sdg_target: 14.C Enhance the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources by implementing international law
questions.kpi: Circular strategies focusing on reduced marine impacts
questions.question: To what extent are circular resource practices (reuse, recycling, nutrient recovery) aligned with strategies to reduce impacts on marine ecosystems?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1. By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular fromland-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
questions.kpi: % reduction of pollutants before discharge
questions.question: Has the company adopted wastewater treatment or pollution control measures specifically designed to minimize nutrient leaching and hazardous discharges that could harm marine environments?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1. By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular fromland-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution
questions.kpi: Share (%) of investment in organic biofertilizers that reduce marine hazards.
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested in eco-innovations (e.g., low-leaching fertilizers, improved nutrient formulations) that lower the risk of marine eutrophication while maintaining market competitiveness?

questions.sdg_target: 14.3. Minimize and address the impacts of ocean acidification, including throughenhanced scientific cooperation at all levels
questions.kpi: Engagement with scientific projects or partnerships to reduce ocean acidification from fertilizer use.
questions.question: Has the company participated in scientific cooperation or community initiatives to raise awareness and build knowledge on the impacts of fertilizer production and use on ocean health?

questions.sdg_target: 15.3 Combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world
questions.kpi: Percentage of total fertiliser product volume composed of recycled or organic-based nutrients
questions.question: To what extent does the company participate in nutrient-loop systems by sourcing organic waste, manure, or digestate to replace virgin raw materials and reduce pressure on land ecosystems?

questions.sdg_target: 15.3 Combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world
questions.kpi: Fertiliser impact on biodiversity, soil health, and land restoration
questions.question: Has the company implemented measures to restore or rehabilitate soils and ecosystems affected by mining activities linked to fertilizer raw material extraction?

questions.sdg_target: 15A. Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems.
questions.kpi: % of annual budget or investment allocated to biodiversity or sustainable land use initiatives
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested financial resources into biodiversity conservation, soil restoration, or sustainable land-use practices along its value chain?

questions.sdg_target: 15.1 Ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands
questions.kpi: Training in ecosystem protection
questions.question: To what extent has the company trained its staff and integrated soil/ecosystem protection principles into fertilizer design, production, and application guidelines?

questions.sdg_target: 16.6 Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
questions.kpi: Transparency in fertiliser component materials
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure transparency in its use of secondary or recycled materials, e.g., by providing clear product labeling, safety datasheets, or disclosure of recovery methods?

questions.sdg_target: 16.6 Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
questions.kpi: Environmental risk reports made public
questions.question: Has the company conducted and shared sustainability or risk assessments of its fertilizer production with relevant stakeholders?

questions.sdg_target: 16.5 Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
questions.kpi: Integrity checks in land and subsidy processes
questions.question: Has the company implemented policies and procedures to ensure fair, transparent, and corruption-free practices in sourcing, procurement, and use of subsidies?

questions.sdg_target: 16.7 Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decisionmaking at all levels
questions.kpi: Farmer/stakeholder consultation systems
questions.question: Has the company established mechanisms that allow employees, suppliers, or smallholder partners to participate in sustainability-related decisions?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.3. Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
questions.kpi: Financial resources mobilized for circular fertilizer initiatives in developing countries
questions.question: To what extent does the company participate in or benefit from financial support schemes (e.g., EU programs, national subsidies, or partnerships) that enable circular fertilizer innovation or international collaboration?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.7. Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies to developing countries on favourable terms, including on concessional andpreferential terms, as mutually agreed
questions.kpi: Biofertilizer initiatives in developing countries
questions.question: Has the company shared or exchanged knowledge, technologies, or practices with partners abroad (e.g., through EU projects, international collaborations, or supplier/customer networks) to promote environmentally sound fertilizer production?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.1. Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to developing countries, to improve domestic capacity for tax and other revenue collection
questions.kpi: Growth in tax payments linked to sustainable biofertilizer production
questions.question: Has the adoption of sustainable practices improved the company’s financial stability (e.g., revenue growth, cost savings, eligibility for funding), strengthening its contribution to the domestic economy (e.g., taxes, reinvestment)?

questions.sdg_target: Target 17.17 Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
questions.kpi: Number of active partnerships
questions.question: To what extent does the company engage in partnerships that support sustainable innovation, knowledge-sharing, or capacity building in the fertilizer sector?

questions.sdg_target: 1.5 – Strengthen resilience of vulnerable groups
questions.kpi: Integration of reusable/recyclable packaging solutions that generate local employment
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated reusable or recyclable packaging models that also create employment or income opportunities in local communities (e.g., collection, sorting, remanufacturing)?

questions.sdg_target: 1.5 – Strengthen resilience for vulnerable workers
questions.kpi: Climate resilience and occupational safety in facilities
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented climate-resilience measures (e.g., ventilation, cooling, flood protection) and integrated them into its occupational health and safety procedures?

questions.sdg_target: 1.2 – Reduce poverty through fair wages and inclusive employment
questions.kpi: Fair wages and inclusive hiring practices
questions.question: To what extent has the company ensured that employees receive fair and decent wages and implemented inclusive recruitment practices for individuals from economically disadvantaged backgrounds?

questions.sdg_target: 1.4 – Ensure access to financial services and social benefits
questions.kpi: Employee access to financial literacy or savings programs
questions.question: Does the company provide or facilitate access to financial literacy training, savings schemes, or similar programs that strengthen workers’ financial security?

questions.sdg_target: 2.4 – Ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices
questions.kpi: Share of bio-based packaging produced from agricultural or food-processing by-products
questions.question: To what extent does the company use renewable and secondary bio-based raw materials, such as agricultural residues, forestry by-products, algae, or other non-food biomass, in its packaging products to reduce competition with food resources and support sustainable material cycles?

questions.sdg_target: 2.5 – Maintain genetic diversity of cultivated plants and farm systems
questions.kpi: Biodiversity-friendly sourcing of bio-based feedstocks
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure that its bio-based materials originate from supply chains verified for biodiversity protection and sustainable land-use practices (e.g., certified regenerative, organic, or biodiversity-friendly sources)?

questions.sdg_target: 2.3 – Double the productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers
questions.kpi: Procurement share from small-scale bio-feedstock producers
questions.question: To what extent has the company increased procurement from small-scale or cooperative producers of bio-feedstock materials for its packaging, thereby enhancing their income and market access?

questions.sdg_target: 2.1 – End hunger and ensure access to safe, nutritious food for all
questions.kpi: Employee access to affordable and nutritious meals
questions.question: To what extent does the company promote employee health and food security through initiatives such as providing nutritious meals, food vouchers, or awareness programs on sustainable nutrition?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 – Reduce exposure to hazardous materials and ensure safe reuse
questions.kpi: Health and safety assurance for reused or recycled packaging materials
questions.question: To what extent does the company ensure that reused or recycled materials incorporated in packaging are tested or certified as safe for human health and environmental use (e.g., food contact, absence of hazardous residues)?

questions.sdg_target: 3.9 – Reduce exposure to harmful substances
questions.kpi: Phase-out of hazardous substances in production
questions.question: To what extent has the company identified and replaced potentially hazardous substances (e.g., chemical additives, inks, PFAS, etc.) with safer alternatives?

questions.sdg_target: 3.C – Strengthen health workforce capacity
questions.kpi: Investment in employee health and safety programs
questions.question: To what extent does the company allocate resources for regular occupational health check-ups and workplace safety programs aimed at reducing absenteeism and improving productivity?

questions.sdg_target: 3.4 – Promote mental health and well-being
questions.kpi: Access to mental health support and flexible work arrangements
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide employees with access to mental health support services and implement flexible working arrangements to promote well-being and work-life balance?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.6 – Literacy and skills (incl. adult learning)
questions.kpi: Share of employees trained on circular packaging practices (design for recyclability/reuse, safe use of recycled content, take-back operations)
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide structured training for employees on circular packaging practices (e.g., design for reuse/recyclability, operating reuse/return systems, etc.)?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.7 – Education for sustainable development
questions.kpi: Integration of sustainability content in onboarding and periodic training (resources, emissions, chemicals, waste)
questions.question: Has the company integrated environmental and sustainability education into employee onboarding and regular training (e.g., resource efficiency, safe chemicals, waste minimization)?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.4 – Skills for decent work
questions.kpi: Investment and participation in job-relevant upskilling/certification (QA, food-contact compliance, eco-design, LCA, digital skills)
questions.question: To what extent does the company invest in employee upskilling that enhance operational performance and competitiveness (e.g. eco-design, LCA, digital/automation skills)?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
questions.sdg_target: 4.5 – Equal access to education and training
questions.kpi: Equitable access to training for underrepresented groups; targeted programs to close gaps
questions.question: Does the company ensure equitable access to training and career development for underrepresented or marginalized employees (with targeted programs to address participation gaps)?

questions.sdg_target: 5.5 – Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities
questions.kpi: Representation of women in circular design and innovation initiatives (e.g., eco-design, recyclability, material substitution)
questions.question: To what extent are women actively involved in the company’s circular packaging activities, such as eco-design, recyclability improvement, material recovery, or sustainability innovation projects?

questions.sdg_target: 5.5 – Ensure equal workplace safety
questions.kpi: Gender-inclusive health and safety practices in production and chemical handling
questions.question: To what extent does the company integrate gender perspectives into its environmental management practices (involving women in environmental monitoring, resource efficiency initiatives, or sustainability committees)?

questions.sdg_target: 5.4 – Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work
questions.kpi: Work-life balance and family support measures (paid leave, childcare, flexibility)
questions.question: To what extent does the company provide and monitor access to paid family leave, childcare support, and flexible work arrangements for employees with care responsibilities?

questions.sdg_target: 5.2 – Eliminate violence and harassment in the workplace
questions.kpi: Anti-harassment and non-discrimination policies with reporting mechanisms
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented and communicated anti-harassment and non-discrimination policies supported by confidential reporting and follow-up mechanisms?

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 – Substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors
questions.kpi: Water reuse and recycling within operations
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented closed-loop or water-recycling systems that allow treated process water to be reused in bio-based packaging production or other industrial operations?

questions.sdg_target: 6.3 – Improve water quality by reducing pollution
questions.kpi: Reduction of wastewater contamination from production
questions.question: Has the company adopted cleaner production and wastewater treatment processes to minimize the release of chemicals, inks, or coatings into water bodies and ensure compliance with discharge standards?

questions.sdg_target: 6.4 – Increase water-use efficiency
questions.kpi: Cost savings through water-efficiency optimization
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated water-efficiency or reuse measures as part of its cost-optimization and resource management strategy?

questions.sdg_target: 6.2 – Ensure access to safe drinking water and sanitation for all
questions.kpi: Workers’ access to safe water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH)
questions.question: Has the company ensured that all employees have access to safe drinking water, sanitation, and hygiene facilities (including gender-appropriate and menstrual hygiene provisions)?

questions.sdg_target: 7.3 – Improve energy efficiency
questions.kpi: Energy recovery and reuse within operations
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented systems to recover and reuse waste heat or other forms of process energy within packaging production, thereby reducing overall energy demand?

questions.sdg_target: 7.2 – Increase the share of renewable energy
questions.kpi: Renewable energy sourcing and strategy
questions.question: Has the company developed and implemented a strategy to replace fossil-based energy with renewable sources (e.g., solar, wind, biomass, or certified green electricity) in its operations?

questions.sdg_target: 7.3 – Improve energy efficiency
questions.kpi: Integration of energy efficiency into cost and resource management strategy
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated energy-efficiency measures (e.g., equipment upgrades, process optimization) into its overall business strategy to enhance competitiveness and reduce operational costs?

questions.sdg_target: 7.A – Enhance access to clean energy knowledge
questions.kpi: Employee training and awareness on energy efficiency
questions.question: Does the company provide regular employee training or awareness programs on energy-saving practices and the efficient use of clean or renewable energy technologies?

questions.sdg_target: 8.3 – Promote circular and inclusive economic models
questions.kpi: Integration of reusable, refillable, or take-back systems
questions.question: To what extent has the company developed or implemented circular business models such as reusable, refillable, or take-bac systems to reduce waste and generate new value streams?

questions.sdg_target: 8.4 – Improve resource efficiency and decouple growth from environmental degradation
questions.kpi: Cleaner and more efficient production technologies
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented cleaner or resource-efficient technologies (e.g., low-carbon materials, energy-efficient production lines) to reduce environmental impacts while sustaining growth?

questions.sdg_target: 8.2 – Achieve higher productivity through sustainable innovation
questions.kpi: Integration of sustainability-driven innovation into business strategy
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated sustainability-driven innovation (e.g., new bio-based materials, recyclable design, digital process optimization) into its business strategy to enhance competitiveness and market growth?

questions.sdg_target: 8.5 – Achieve full and productive employment and equal pay for all
questions.kpi: Decent work and inclusion programs
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented measures to ensure safe, fair, and stable employment conditions for all workers, including fair pay, working hours, and equal opportunity?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.1 – Develop quality, reliable, sustainable, and resilient infrastructure
questions.kpi: Infrastructure enabling closed-loop packaging systems
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested in or collaborated on shared infrastructure (e.g., collection, sorting, or refill systems) that enables circular packaging loops?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.4 – Upgrade all industries and infrastructures for sustainability
questions.kpi: Integration of digital and low-impact production systems
questions.question: To what extent has the company digitalised or modernised its production infrastructure (e.g., automation, digital monitoring, predictive maintenance) to improve environmental performance and resilience?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.5 – Enhance scientific research and upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors
questions.kpi: Collaboration and innovation capacity
questions.question: To what extent does the company participate in collaborative innovation projects (e.g., R&D pilots, public–private partnerships, or innovation clusters) focused on advancing bio-based and circular packaging technologies?

questions.sdg_description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
questions.sdg_target: 9.a – Facilitate sustainable and inclusive industrialisation
questions.kpi: Inclusion and accessibility in industrial transformation
questions.question: To what extent does the company promote inclusive participation (e.g., SMEs, women, local suppliers) in its innovation or production ecosystem for sustainable packaging?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 – Empower and promote the social, economic, and political inclusion of all
questions.kpi: Inclusion of marginalized actors in circular value chains
questions.question: To what extent does the company include or collaborate with small or underrepresented suppliers, recyclers, etc. within its circular packaging systems?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.3 – Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome
questions.kpi: Equal participation in environmental programs
questions.question: Does the company have formal mechanisms ensuring employees from all roles and backgrounds can propose or review environmental improvements?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.4 – Adopt policies to promote greater equality
questions.kpi: Fair distribution of financial rewards and advancement opportunities
questions.question: Has the company established documented and regularly reviewed procedures for transparent salary bands, promotion criteria, and performance-based incentives accessible to all employees?

questions.sdg_description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
questions.sdg_target: 10.2 – Promote inclusion through cultural awareness and belonging
questions.kpi: Inclusion and sense of belonging within workforce
questions.question: To what extent does the company foster inclusion and belonging among employees through structured diversity programs, cultural awareness training, or inclusive workplace policies?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 – Reduce urban waste generation and environmental impact
questions.kpi: Participation in local circular packaging systems
questions.question: Does the company collaborate with external stakeholders to establish or support urban packaging take-back, refill, or reuse systems?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.6 – Reduce the adverse environmental impact of cities
questions.kpi: Urban pollution prevention
questions.question: Has the company assessed and implemented measures to minimise air, noise, or waste emissions from its urban production or logistics sites (e.g., low-emission transport, dust or odour control)?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.A – Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban and rural areas
questions.kpi: Local partnerships supporting circular economy
questions.question: To what extent does the company establish economic partnerships with urban micro-enterprises or social cooperatives that strengthen local circular value chains?

questions.sdg_description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
questions.sdg_target: 11.1 – Ensure access to safe and affordable housing and transport
questions.kpi: Worker mobility and wellbeing
questions.question: Has the company adopted workplace measures that improve employees’ urban well-being, such as flexible schedules, safe facilities, or support for commuting and family needs?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.5 – Substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse
questions.kpi: % of total packaging materials designed or recovered for reuse, recycling, or composting
questions.question: To what extent has the company established clear targets and mechanisms to ensure its packaging materials are reused, recycled, or composted within a circular system?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.4 – Ensure environmentally sound management of chemicals and waste throughout their lifecycle
questions.kpi: Presence of a chemical and waste management procedure aligned with ISO or GRI frameworks
questions.question: Has the company implemented and regularly updated procedures to manage chemical inputs (e.g., inks, coatings, adhesives) and prevent their release into the environment during and after production?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.6 – Encourage companies to adopt sustainable practices and integrate sustainability information into reporting
questions.kpi: Existence and integration of sustainability performance indicators in financial or management reporting
questions.question: To what extent has the company integrated sustainability performance indicators (e.g., resource efficiency, waste savings, emission reductions) into its financial planning and decision-making processes?

questions.sdg_description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
questions.sdg_target: 12.8 – Ensure that people everywhere have relevant information and awareness for sustainable development
questions.kpi: Existence of communication or awareness initiatives on sustainable packaging
questions.question: Does the company actively educate employees, clients, or consumers on responsible packaging use, recycling, or disposal through awareness campaigns or product information?

questions.sdg_target: 13.1 – Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards
questions.kpi: Existence of climate-resilient circular operations (e.g., sourcing, logistics, materials)
questions.question: To what extent has the company adapted its circular value chain to withstand climate-related disruptions such as extreme weather or raw-material shortages?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 – Integrate climate measures into strategies and planning
questions.kpi: Existence of a GHG inventory and verified mitigation targets
questions.question: Has the company quantified its greenhouse-gas emissions and set verifiable emission-reduction or neutrality targets?

questions.sdg_target: 13.2 – Integrate climate-related risks and opportunities into financial planning
questions.kpi: Integration of climate-risk scenarios into strategic and financial planning
questions.question: To what extent has the company assessed and integrated climate-related risks (e.g., energy prices, supply chain disruptions, regulation) and opportunities (e.g., green-market access) into its financial or strategic planning?

questions.sdg_target: 13.3 – Improve education, awareness, and capacity on climate mitigation and adaptation
questions.kpi: % of employees trained or engaged in climate initiatives
questions.question: Does the company provide training or engagement opportunities for employees and partners to understand climate risks and contribute to mitigation or adaptation actions within their roles?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1 – Reduce marine pollution from land-based activities
questions.kpi: Presence and maturity of granulate/powder/pellet loss-prevention and stormwater controls
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented controls to prevent material loss (e.g., pellets, flakes, powders, fines) to drains and stormwater?

questions.sdg_target: 14.3 – Minimize and address impacts of ocean acidification
questions.kpi: Implementation of acidifying emissions/effluent monitoring and neutralization
questions.question: To what extent has the company monitored and reduced acidifying emissions or effluents that can alter downstream water pH?

questions.sdg_target: 14.a – Increase scientific knowledge, research capacity for ocean health
questions.kpi: Budget and collaborations for aquatic-safety R&D (eco-toxicity, fragmentation, microfiber/microplastic risk, water-degradation testing)
questions.question: To what extent has the company invested in R&D or partnerships to assess and reduce aquatic impacts of its materials/processes?

questions.sdg_target: 14.1 / 14.a – Reduce pollution via awareness & cooperation
questions.kpi: Share of workforce/partners covered by spill response & water-protection training and incident reporting
questions.question: Has the company implemented training and reporting mechanisms for employees and contractors on spill prevention, stormwater protection, and incident response related to potential water contamination?

questions.sdg_target: 15.2 – Sustainably manage forests; halt deforestation / 15.5 – Reduce habitat loss
questions.kpi: Share and maturity of actions that lower reliance on virgin land-sourced biomass (e.g., recycled fibre content, agri-by-products, design that reduces material intensity)
questions.question: To what extent has the company reduced dependence on virgin land-sourced biomass by increasing recycled/secondary bio-based inputs?

questions.sdg_target: 15.2 – Sustainably manage forests; halt deforestation / 15.1 – Conserve terrestrial ecosystems
questions.kpi: Existence and coverage of a deforestation- and conversion-free (DCF) sourcing policy with traceability/certification for plant-based inputs (pulp, starch, etc.)
questions.question: To what extent has the company ensured that the sourcing of all bio-based feedstocks (e.g., wood, crops, or biowaste) avoids deforestation, habitat conversion, or soil degradation?

questions.sdg_target: 15.3 – Combat land degradation and ensure sustainable use of soils
questions.kpi: Existence of internal procedures integrating land-use and biodiversity risks into sourcing and procurement decisions
questions.question: To what extent does the company assess and manage financial or operational risks linked to land degradation and biodiversity loss in its supply chain?

questions.sdg_target: 15.1 – Conserve terrestrial ecosystems / 15.3 – Combat land degradation
questions.kpi: Supplier & staff capacity-building on land stewardship (training coverage; grievance/reporting mechanisms for no-conversion; corrective-action follow-up)
questions.question: Has the company provided awareness or training for employees on biodiversity protection, land use impacts, and sustainable materials handling?

questions.sdg_target: 16.6 – Develop effective, accountable, and transparent institutions at all levels
questions.kpi: Availability of transparent traceability and product information system
questions.question: To what extent has the company established systems to ensure transparent traceability of materials and disclosure of circular design or recyclability information to clients, partners, or regulators?

questions.sdg_target: 16.6 – Promote environmental accountability and transparency
questions.kpi: Monitoring and disclosure of environmental performance data
questions.question: To what extent does the company monitor and transparently report its environmental performance internally or publicly?

questions.sdg_target: 16.5 – Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
questions.kpi: Existence and enforcement of anti-corruption and fair-procurement procedures
questions.question: To what extent has the company implemented anti-corruption, conflict-of-interest, and fair-procurement measures to ensure integrity and transparency in financial and sourcing decisions?

questions.sdg_target: 16.7 – Ensure inclusive, participatory, and representative decision-making
questions.kpi: Employee and stakeholder participation in sustainability decisions
questions.question: To what extent does the company involve employees in identifying, discussing, or improving sustainability and ethical practices (e.g., through feedback sessions, small working groups, or joint improvement initiatives)?

questions.sdg_target: 17.1 – Strengthen domestic resource mobilization
questions.kpi: Collaboration on circular design and sourcing initiatives
questions.question: To what extent does the company cooperate with local/regional suppliers or business associations to improve material circularity?

questions.sdg_target: 17.7 – Promote environmentally sound technology transfer
questions.kpi: Participation in knowledge-exchange or pilot initiatives for clean technologies
questions.question: To what extent has the company shared, received, or co-developed environmentally sound packaging technologies or practices with other organizations or regions?

questions.sdg_target: 17.3 – Mobilize additional financial and partnership resources
questions.kpi: Engagement in funding or co-financing mechanisms for sustainable innovation
questions.question: To what extent has the company accessed or participated in collaborative funding opportunities, joint investments, or cost-sharing initiatives that support sustainable packaging innovation or upgrades?

questions.sdg_target: 17.6 – Enhance international and regional cooperation
questions.kpi: Participation in collaborative networks and joint learning platforms
questions.question: To what extent does the company engage in peer-learning networks, trade associations, or community groups to exchange experiences and promote sustainable packaging practices?
